Pure Java Programming class

Tuesdays & Thursdays | 3:00pm-4:30pm (Ages 11-14) | Bukit Damansara
Register Now
Weekly on Tues & Thurs

What is this Pure Java Programming class about?

We have created this class to teach the fundamentals of programming with Java. Java is one of the most popular programming languages in use, and it will serve the basis for those interested to develop a full-feldge mobile app.

In these classes, students will learn to code using Java while developing their computational thinking skills.

Below are the details of the weekly classes.

Pure Java Programming class

Age Group: Ages 11-14
Duration: 10 weeks, on Tuesdays and Thursdays (i.e. twice a week)
Time: 3:00pm to 4:30pm
Venue: Bukit Damansara (Unit PL03, Block A, Plaza Damansara, Damansara Heights)
Price: RM 1,699

Featured Tool

  • Java JDK
  • Eclipse

Requirements

  • Bring your own laptop (PC, Linux or Mac), power supply and mouse
  • Have programming experience (e.g. Scratch)

Weekly on Tues & Thurs
